games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Night City awaits in this futuristic open-world RPG. Immerse yourself in a gripping storyline and explore a vast, visually stunning metropolis.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: Embark on an emotional journey in a post-apocalyptic world. Uncover the harsh realities of survival as you navigate through intense action and gripping storytelling.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Become a legendary Viking raider and lead your clan to glory. Explore the stunning landscapes of England, engage in epic battles, and shape the destiny of your people.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: Enter a dark fantasy world crafted by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin. Unravel the mysteries, face formidable enemies, and discover the power of the Elden Ring.

games.name: Halo Infinite
games.description: Enter a dark fantasy world crafted by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin. Unravel the mysteries, face formidable enemies, and discover the power of the Elden Ring.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: Grand Theft Auto V, an action-packed open-world adventure, offers a stunning reimagining of Southern California's landscapes, complete with a vibrant city, picturesque beaches, and a diverse suburban backdrop.
